content: to end of round round 2-3 knit in pattern to marker sm p1 knit to one stitch before next marker p1 sm knit remaining stitches in pattern round 4 knit in pattern to marker sm p1 m1r k2 m1l p1 in pattern to marker sm p1 k1 m1r k2 m1l k1 p1 sm knit remaining stitches in pattern 8 stitches between markers round 8-9 knit in pattern to marker sm p1 knit to one stitch before next marker p1 sm knit remaining stitches in pattern round 10 knit in pattern to marker sm p1 k2 m1r k2 m1l k2 p1 sm knit remaining stitches in pattern 10 stitches between markers pattern copyright to holly terrell 2015 you are welcome to use this pattern to knit your own mitts mitts as a gift or for charitable purposes you may not sell the pattern itself or the finished goods made from this pattern or give this pattern away to sell yarn please direct any questions to corvidae on ravelry thank you for knitting my design 2 spira mitts round 11-12 knit in pattern to marker sm p1 knit to one stitch before next marker p1 sm knit remaining stitches in pattern round 13 knit in pattern to marker sm p1 k3 m1r k2 m1l k3 p1 sm knit remaining stitches in pattern 12 stitches between markers round 14-15 knit in
